titleStmt.title: Christ set forth in several sermons upon the 7th chapter to the Hebrews. By Mr. Robert Ottee, late pastor to a congregation in Beckles in Suffolk
titleStmt.author: Ottee, Robert, d. 1690.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Edward Giles bookseller in Norwich, near the Market-place,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: Christ set forth.
Reproduction of the original in the Congregational Library, London.
